templates.template: MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL]-()-[:$REL]-(b:event) WHERE NOT (a)-[:$REL]-(b) WITH a, count(DISTINCT b) AS cnt RETURN b.id, cnt
MATCH (a:event {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL]-()-[:$REL]-(b:event) WHERE NOT (a)-[:$REL]-(b) WITH a, count(DISTINCT b) AS cnt RETURN b.id, cnt
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL]-()-[:$REL]-(b:entity) WHERE NOT (a)-[:$REL]-(b) WITH a, count(DISTINCT b) AS cnt RETURN b.id, cnt
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity) RETURN a.id, b.id, c.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity)-[:$REL2]->(c:event) RETURN a.id, b.id, c.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:entity) RETURN a.id, b.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:event) RETURN a.id, b.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity) RETURN a.id, count(d) AS cnt,collect(d) AS d_list
MATCH p = (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:entity) RETURN avg(length(p)) AS avg_len, collect(b) AS b_list
MATCH p = (a:event {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:event) RETURN avg(length(p)) AS avg_len, collect(b) AS b_list
MATCH p = (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:event) RETURN avg(length(p)) AS avg_len, collect(b) AS b_list
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE (a)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE}) RETURN a.id, count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE}), (b:$LABEL2) WHERE (a)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(b) RETURN count(b),collect(b) AS b_list
MATCH (n:entity) WHERE (n)-[:$REL1]->(:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE1}) OR (n)-[:$REL2]->(:entity {$PROP_ID2: $VALUE2}) RETURN count(n) AS cnt,collect(n) AS n_list
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity) MATCH (a)-[:$REL2]->(b) RETURN collect(b.id) AS b_list, count(*) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:event) MATCH (a)-[:$REL2]->(b) RETURN collect(b.id) AS b_list, count(*) AS cnt
MATCH (n:entity)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(m:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE}) RETURN collect(n.id) AS n_list, count(n) AS cnt
MATCH (a:$LABEL1)-[r:$REL_TYPE]-(b:$LABEL2) WHERE r.$REL_PROP $OP $VALUE RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:$LABEL1)-[r:$REL_TYPE]-(b:$LABEL2) WHERE r.$REL_PROP $OP $VALUE RETURN a, count(b) AS cnt
MATCH (a:$LABEL1)-[r:$REL_TYPE]-(b:$LABEL2) WHERE r.$REL_PROP $OP $VALUE RETURN avg(r.$REL_PROP), max(r.$REL_PROP)

MATCH (f:entity)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(provider:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN f.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'compuatation') AND ANY(c IN provider.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'reasoning') RETURN f.id AS ComputeNode, provider.id AS StorageProvider

MATCH (f:entity)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(provider:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN provider.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'reasoning') RETURN provider.id AS ProviderID, count(f) AS CountOfMemoryFunctions, collect(f.id) AS ListOfMemoryFunctions ORDER BY CountOfMemoryFunctions DESC
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[r:$REL_TYPE]-(b:entity) RETURN count(b), collect(b) AS b_list
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[r:$REL_TYPE]-(b:entity) RETURN avg(r.$REL_PROP), max(r.$REL_PROP)
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity)-[:$REL3]->(d:entity) RETURN a.id, b.id, c.id, d.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity)-[:$REL3]->(d:entity) RETURN a.id, b.id, c.id, d.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:entity) RETURN a.id, b.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity)-[:$REL3]->(d:entity) RETURN a.id, count(d) AS cnt,collect(d) AS d_list
MATCH p = (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL_TYPE *$MIN_HOPS..$MAX_HOPS]-(b:entity) RETURN avg(length(p)) AS avg_len
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity) WITH b MATCH (b)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity) WHERE c.$FILTER_PROP = $FILTER_VAL RETURN b.id, c.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity) WITH b MATCH (b)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity) WHERE c.$FILTER_PROP = $FILTER_VAL RETURN b, count(c) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:entity) WITH b MATCH (b)-[:$REL2]->(c:entity) WHERE c.$FILTER_PROP = $FILTER_VAL WITH b, count(c) AS cnt WHERE cnt > $THRESHOLD RETURN b, cnt
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE})-[:$REL1]->(b:$LABEL2) MATCH (a)-[:$REL2]->(b) RETURN count(b),collect(b.id) AS cnt
MATCH (f:$LABEL) OPTIONAL MATCH (other:$LABEL)-[r]->(f) RETURN f.$PROP_ID, count(r) AS incoming_relationships, collect(type(r)) AS rel_types ORDER BY incoming_relationships
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE (a)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE}) RETURN a.id
MATCH (n:entity) WHERE (n)-[:$REL1]->(:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE}) RETURN n.id
MATCH (a:entity {$PROP_ID: $VALUE}), (b:$LABEL2) WHERE (a)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(b) RETURN count(b),collect(b) AS b_list
MATCH (n:entity) WHERE (n)-[:$REL1]->(:entity {$PROP_ID1: $VALUE1}) OR (n)-[:$REL2]->(:entity {$PROP_ID2: $VALUE2}) RETURN count(n) AS cnt,collect(n) AS n_list

MATCH (f:entity) MATCH (f)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(provider:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN provider.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'programming') RETURN f.id AS TargetFunction, count(provider) AS CountOfCodeProviders,collect(provider.id) AS ListOfCodeProviders

MATCH (f:entity) MATCH (f)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(provider:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN provider.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'command') RETURN f.id AS TargetFunction, count(provider) AS CountOfCodeProviders,collect(provider.id) AS ListOfCodeProviders

MATCH (f:entity)-[:$REL_TYPE]->(provider:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN f.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'compuatation') AND ANY(c IN provider.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'reasoning') RETURN f.id AS ComputeNode, provider.id AS StorageProvider
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'link') AND ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'resource') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'tool') AND ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'retriev') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'tool') AND ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'creation') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'tool') AND ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'model') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'tool') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'script') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'command') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
MATCH (a:entity) WHERE ANY(c IN a.concept WHERE toLower(c) CONTAINS 'manual') RETURN count(a) AS cnt
